@barbarascully @Suzanne_Brett & our treatment in Vincent's was terrible. They wouldn't give her Alzheimers & anxiety meds. Just kept saying
@Suzanne_Brett @barbarascully things happen I know but when it's out of your control it seems cruel & unusual. Getting old sucks!!!

@ClaireByrneLive impossible situation. Couldn't afford home help - did it on my own for 6yrs. Heartbreaking
@ClaireByrneLive & im still not sure about the implications. Mums gone to a home now. We only had 9hts from Alzheimers Soc
